body_html: There is no need to apply another AffineChannelOp when using SpatialBN in a single GPU. The AffineChannelOp currently is only a preparation for BN with multiple GPUs, but now we haven't add that in Caffe2.
body_text: There is no need to apply another AffineChannelOp when using SpatialBN in a single GPU. The AffineChannelOp currently is only a preparation for BN with multiple GPUs, but now we haven't add that in Caffe2.
body: There is no need to apply another AffineChannelOp when using SpatialBN in a single GPU. The AffineChannelOp currently is only a preparation for BN with multiple GPUs, but now we haven't add that in Caffe2.
